Greeting fellow kerbonaut! A lurker, weren't you? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

For changing avatar and other changes refer to "Settings" on the top right corner of the page.

Welcome to the forums!

We are actually a very international community here and I've found the members to be very helpful and friendly, despite language barriers.

You can set an avatar after you have made three posts, I believe.

Happy landings!
